mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.`name`, c.description FROM category c WHERE c.active_flag = 1 AND c.delete_flag = 0;
SELECT c.id, c.`name`, c.description FROM category c WHERE c.id = #{id} AND c.active_flag = 1 AND c.delete_flag = 0;
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.description FROM category c WHERE name = #{name} AND delete_flag = 0 AND active_flag = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (`name`, description, delete_flag, active_flag, created_date, created_by, last_modified_date, last_modified_by) VALUES(#{item.name}, #{item.description}, b'0', b'1', UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), #{item.createdBy}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), #{item.lastModifiedBy});
mapper.delete: UPDATE category SET delete_flag = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
